author: David Stålhane
comment: Hade hoppats att kunna använda appen för att hantera incheckningar etc. Det kan inte appen, utan det är endast en länk till deras hemsida vilket gör appen helt överflödig.

author: Bent Aasen
comment: Helt skjef å ha med seg på reisen :)

author: Helge Penne
comment: Requires that I set my phone's font size to "small" or "tiny", or it will not show departure times when ordering tickets.  Airports are not shown in search results, only city, which is unacceptable.  Check-in for Lufthansa fails consistently.  Needs more work.
title: Unfinished

author: Einar Sæland
comment: As a service engineer and frequent flyer, the app is great for keeping track of the flight schedule and has become my go-to application.  However, once off the beaten track without wifi or mobile data, the app refuses to start. My workaround has been to take screenshots while connected. It would greatly improve the app to have an offline mode, with the ability to sync automaticly aswell as on command - and a timestamp for last successful sync.
title: Great app when online

author: Åsmund Sveinsvoll
comment: Super funksjonalitet. Men desverre har jeg ofte opplevd at den låser sei, å slutter å funke.
title: Bra app

author: Mirza sadikovic
comment: Quick and easy. All you nred for your business travel. workes like a charm on samsung s3
title: Quick and easy

author: Atle Sundling
comment: The application just terminates when you try to log in. This happened first after i installed the previous update. It still terminates on the latest update that was released yesterday. I use a GalaxyS3.
title: Last two updates does not work

author: Erik Taraldset Elgaaen
comment: Great app generally but after last update I'm not able to book a trip.

reply.author: Berg-Hansen Reisebureau AS
reply.content: If you haven't already solved this issue, please contact us at app@berg-hansen.no so that we can help you debug.

title: Not able to book trips with most recent update

author: A Google User
comment: Have tried to send reports and contacted Berg-Hansen, but still no solution available..
title: App crashes during startup

author: A Google User
comment: Fungerer utmerket på min samsung galaxy s2, genialt. Bakdelen er at jeg ikke kunne få den på samsung galaxy tab 10.1, Why?
title: Samsung

author: A Google User
comment: but very slow logging in, and if you (or berg Hansen) are offline you can't see your trips! Please fix this and include some sort of offlinemode.
title: Good

author: A Google User
comment: Nice. A bit slow on network comm
title: Good

author: A Google User
comment: The aps does not load singel trips on my galaxy notes
title: Its not working

author: A Google User
comment: Piece of crap. Does not show up in apps. Does not log in
